aboutme.summary: Highly passionate about Front End and user experience with 2+ years of professional experience building scalable and user friendly web applications. Always adquiring new knowledge, and learning the best practices to improve my work and to teach the ones that sorround me. Areas of expertise include Front End development with React, Back End development using NodeJs with Express, proficient troubleshooting, Scrum & Agile Methodologies. Love to do sports like Tennis, Table Tennis and Football, to watch Anime and very passionate about Music, my all time favorite band is Oasis.

ripley.title: Ripley
ripley.descriptions:
Worked in the Customer Care team to create the new after sale platform for Chile and Peru. Helping around 400000 customers a month. Providing an easier way for customers to check their purchase status, update their personal data and be able to file a claim.

Started the creation of a purchase tracking system, to track around 1.000.000 products a month. Using NodeJs and Express, implemented as microservices in AWS.

Mentored 3 new developers on React.

Started the inclusion of Terraform within the team, to reduce the resource time creation by about 60%.

pucv.title: PUCV
pucv.descriptions:
Created a Wifi saturation indicator for the University to show the students the best spot to connect, the usage was around 40% from all the students. Used VueJs for the FrontEnd and NodeJs with Express for the BackEnd.

Started the creation of a live lessons streaming service for approximately 30% of the students initially.

ibm.title: IBM
ibm.descriptions:
Developed a cognitive chat using IBM's Watson for Antofagasta Minerals, to decrease the calls to the call center by 40% initially.

Created a Dashboard to analyze the data from the chatbot using VueJs.
